response:
Dear ram,

Thank you for reaching out for password assistance. To reset your password, please follow these steps:
1. Go to our self-service portal at company.com/reset
2. Enter your company email address
3. Check your email for the reset link (including spam folder)
4. Click the link and create a new password following our policy guidelines
5. Update the new password in all saved locations (browsers, mobile apps)
6. Test login on primary work applications

If you encounter any issues or remain locked out after successful reset, please contact IT support immediately. Remember, passwords must be a minimum of 8 characters with mixed case, numbers, and symbols.

For any urgent matters or account lockouts, please escalate to security@techcorp.com.

Regards,
Raghu

Dear ram,

Thank you for your follow-up. If you require further assistance beyond the password reset, please provide specific details about the issue you are facing so we can assist you more effectively. 

For any urgent matters or if you encounter persistent issues, please do not hesitate to escalate to security@techcorp.com. We are here to ensure the security and functionality of your account.

Regards,
Raghu
